import React from 'react' import styled from 'styled-components' const Container = styled.div` flex: 1; ` const Image = styled.img` width: 100%; ` const Info = styled.div` ` const Title = styled.p` ` const Button = styled.button` ` const CategoryItem = ({item}) => { return (
{item.title}
) } export default CategoryItem
